arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs. Chelsea: UEFA Champions League team news and LIVE blog!
arts.sum: While Michael Olise and new signing Luis DÃ­az have impressed in the season's early weeks, Harry Kane remains Bayern's star man, netting a brace versus HSV to take his 2025/26 tally to eight goals. Chelsea head to Munich having followed up their Club World Cup win with an unbeaten start to the English Premier League campaign, although they missed the chance to move second in the table as they conceded deep into injury time in their 2-2 draw with Brentford at the weekend.
